profile_positions.title: Dedicated investor - entrepreneur in successful (e-commerce) companies with scale-up potential

profile_positions.description:
Founder, owner and managing director of PrintAbout N.V., the #2 printer specialist of the Benelux. Our main focus is the sale of products and services related to printer, i.e. printer supplies (ink & toner cartridges), printer hardware, printer leasing, service & maintenance and paper. 

Our turnover – approximately Euro 35mln - is generated in The Netherlands and Belgium, both via our webshops ( www.printabout.nl/be) and our dedicated telesales team. PrintAbout boasts approximately 1.2million customers, both corporate and consumers. Per year we process approximately 450,000 orders, which are shipped directly from our warehouse. The majority of our sales are realised in the B-to-B segment. PrintAbout has around 60 dedicated employees. With roughly 65,000 independent reviews our customer satisfaction score is 4.7 out of 5.0.

Ambitious and sustainable growth with a healthy margin is one of the key objectives of PrintAbout. In recent years the annual growth has been around 15-35% y-o-y. As a result of this ambitous growth, PrintAbout has been awarded the prestigious ‘Gazellen Award’ by the Dutch financial newspaper FD / Het Financieele Dagblad. PrintAbout has also been nominated for the Dutch Shopping Awards and the ABN-AMRO Webshop Awards several times.
profile_positions.title: Founder, owner and director

profile_positions.description:
Advisor for corporate finance, focused on M&A transactions in the small to medium sized enterprises segment. As a deal captain I was involved in and responsible for the origination and execution of over 25 successful deals, including MBI's & MBO's. 
I won the prestigious Rabo Securities "M&A Deal of the Year" award 2001.
profile_positions.title: Rabo Securities, Corporate Advisory, Advisor

profile_positions.description: I was member of a small dedicated internal M&A team responsible for the identification, valuation, negotiation and execution of acquisition opportunities for ABB in a newly developing market. My responsibilities included the presentation of potential targets and acquisition projects to senior ABB executives. Other areas of responsibility included the compilation of sector- and company studies, business- and restructuring reports, and company strategies.
profile_positions.title: Manager Business Development

company.name: Ballmaier & Schultz (later known as Baader Securities)

profile_positions.company: Ballmaier & Schultz (later known as Baader Securities)
profile_positions.description: My chief responsibility was the coverage of the Czech Food & Beverage sectors. I completed several in- depth company analyses and made a comprehensive study and analysis of the illustrious and world famous Czech brewing industry. Several articles of this analysis were quoted in the leading financial press, among which Financial Times and Wall Street Journal.
profile_positions.title: Junior Equity Analyst ( on project basis)
